quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.
author: Osho

quote: You always gain by giving love.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Love doesn’t make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is not something you feel. It is something you do.
author: David Wilkerson

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: We are shaped and fashioned by what we love.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do every day.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: We love the things we love for what they are.
author: Robert Frost

quote: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return.
author: Madonna

quote: Love is the only reality, and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Do not seek the because—in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: G.K. Chesterton
